product.title: Hand Balm BKIND Rose and Geranium in Multi
product.body_html: For the ones in need of a deep nourishing therapy for irritated skin, our hand balm is perfect to calm the dry skin areas of the hands, that are constantly exposed to external damage. Made from a mix of deeply nourishing ingredients, our hand balm moisturizes, soothes, repairs, and promotes tissue healing. All those powerful natural ingredients come together as a winning formula to keep the hands soft, young and protected.
